revised_title: Solving Linear Differential Equations: General Theorems and Transformations
tldr: The author, Brice Bronwin, presents methods for solving linear differential equations using transformations and theorems in the calculus of operations. The paper discusses various classes of equations, each with its unique transformation process, and demonstrates how these methods can be applied to a wide range of equations with integer and non-integer functions of x. The author also highlights the interchangeability of symbols D and x in the equations and their solutions.
